name: One Night at Gina's 2 (Official)
description:
Description:

Hey, Hey! Welcome to the new and improved Gina's Pizzeria, after we shut down the original Gina's in 2007 due to animatronic malfunctions and them being found outside their stages. With animatronics with new safety technology and even some new characters.

Credits:

Me for The ONAG Series

Scott Cawthon For the FNAF Series
